courseDescription:
The guidelines for an effective anti-bribery management system were released by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) in 2016. They describe the requirements for establishing, putting into practice, running, maintaining, and improving an anti-bribery management system (ABMS). It also offers advice on the steps and methods organizations can take to follow these guidelines. Therefore, professionals at Exoexcellence Consultants have created this exclusive course to give you the tools to understand better the guidelines set by the standard ISO 37001.

This course consists of two modules, divided into six topics. The first topic introduces you to the ISO 37001 standard, its domain, and the importance of implementing its guidelines within a workplace. As you move forward, you will receive explanations of the seven main compliance areas of the ISO 37001 standard, i.e., organization, leadership, planning, support, operation, performance, and growth. Each of these compliance areas has been explained in a clause-by-clause manner to create better readability of the text presented in the course.

By the end of this course, you will learn the goals, domains, guidelines and benefits of ISO 37001. In this regard, the course's structuring will be helpful, as it emphasizes explaining the sub-clauses in more detail by giving practical explanations. Once completed, you will have to take a short assessment to get the Alison certificate.
